Description:
Detects when Events are deleted in Azure Kubernetes. An adversary may delete events in Azure Kubernetes in an attempt to evade detection.

Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Azure Kubernetes Events Deleted
Query: sourcetype='azure-activitylogs' eql select * from _source_ where operationname = 'microsoft.kubernetes/connectedclusters/events.k8s.io/events/delete'
